name: Arlecchino
storytext: Solitary Balemoon in a Sky of Fading Stars.
source: Reward for inviting Arlecchino to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Invitation to a Beheading
skills.descriptionraw: Deal $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. If possible, consume up to 3 stacks of the target's <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122]</color> and increase DMG by the same amount.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deal 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>. If possible, consume up to 3 stacks of the target's <color=#FFFFFFFF>Bond of Life</color> and increase DMG by the same amount.
skills.description: Deal 2 Physical DMG. If possible, consume up to 3 stacks of the target's Bond of Life and increase DMG by the same amount.

skills.name: All Is Ash
skills.descriptionraw: Create 5 stacks of <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113141]</color> on the opponent's side of the field and deal $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT].
skills.descriptionreplaced: Create 5 stacks of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Blood-Debt Directive</color> on the opponent's side of the field and deal 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>.
skills.description: Create 5 stacks of Blood-Debt Directive on the opponent's side of the field and deal 2 Pyro DMG.

skills.name: Balemoon Rising
skills.descriptionraw: Deal $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. Remove all of your stacks of <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122]</color> and heal yourself for 1 HP per stack.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deal 4 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>. Remove all of your stacks of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Bond of Life</color> and heal yourself for 1 HP per stack.
skills.description: Deal 4 Pyro DMG. Remove all of your stacks of Bond of Life and heal yourself for 1 HP per stack.

skills.name: The Balemoon Alone May Know
skills.descriptionraw: Characters won't receive healing from sources other than <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S13143]</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122]</color> is attached to self:</color> $[K100] dealt by characters is converted to $[K103].

skills.description:
Characters won't receive healing from sources other than Balemoon Rising.
